items.title: Visa refreshes Infinite card benefits across 18 Asia Pacific markets
items.description: Visa, a global leader in digital payments, today announced refreshed card benefits for Visa Infinite in 18 markets[1] across Asia Pacific. Visa recognises that affluent consumers seek to enhance their life's moments. To meet their evolving preferences, Visa offers Infinite cardholders access to elevated experiences â€“ from the everyday to the extraordinary.
